meanings: (음식점) restaurant, caf; (작은) bistro; (값싼 음식을 파는) (Am) diner; (간단한 먹거리와 음료를 파는) tearoom, coffee bar, snack bar, (Am) coffee shop; (구내식당) cafeteria, (Am) lunchroom, (Brit) canteen; (군대의) mess hall

vlive.korean: "식당 밥 공기 작아?" "Was the rice bowl small"? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 이또아승🦊🐶Ep.1 다시...ㅠ
여기 식당인데, 되게 유명한 식당인데 요즘... It's a famous restaurant these days. 듣기 View video NCT : 여러분도 올래요?
vlive.english: It's a famous restaurant these days.

vlive.korean: 식당이라고 해야 하나요? there's a place like a restaurant. 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST REN] 러브들♥️
vlive.english: there's a place like a restaurant.

vlive.korean: 아니 식당에서 - 식당에서? - 저는... No, at the cafeteria. - The cafeteria? - I... 듣기 View video Stray Kids : SKZ-LIFE (슼즈라이프) Ep.02📸
vlive.english: No, at the cafeteria. - The cafeteria? - I...

vlive.korean: 뉴이스트의 심야식당 오늘도 어떻게? So what are we going to do for today's V LIVE? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.6
vlive.english: So what are we going to do for today's V LIVE?

examples.korean: The children were banished from the dining room. 발음듣기 아이들은 벌로 식당에서 쫓겨났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The children were banished from the dining room. 발음

examples.korean: There are three dining halls on campus. 발음듣기 캠퍼스 내에 식당이 세 군데 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: There are three dining halls on campus. 발음

examples.korean: He waxed lyrical on the food at the new restaurant. 발음듣기 그는 그 식당의 음식에 대해 (말을 하면서 차츰) 열정적이 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He waxed lyrical on the food at the new restaurant. 발음

examples.korean: the segregation of smokers and non-smokers in restaurants 발음듣기 식당에서 흡연자와 비흡연자의 분리 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the segregation of smokers and non-smokers in restaurants 발음

examples.korean: Hot and cold food is available in the cafeteria. 발음듣기 자율 식당에서는 따뜻한 음식과 찬 음식을 먹을 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Hot and cold food is available in the cafeteria. 발음
